3: Life once again graces Liv's face.
You're okay... I was so worried...
I'm sorry that we couldn't protect you...
Lucia, Lee, Commandant, I'm worried about you all, too...
They were pretty good just now. Nothing suspicious!
Li clenches his fists and walks forward.
I finished the mission for you, Watanabe.
Liv, thanks to your selflessness and courage, we're able to reunite with the imprisoned Forsaken.
Apologies for putting you in danger, Gray Raven...
In the future, we'll assist Gray Raven to the best of our ability whenever you are operating in the area.
On the condition that this applies only to Gray Raven and that you will not threaten us Forsaken...
My answer is no... But we're open to discussion.
If you don't have any objection, we can send you to a base that's actually safe.
There you can also stock up as you please, or choose to leave.
Won't have anything fishy in it.
Will just be normal mint tea.
